column4: Hello, I would like help installing a printer. I have never done so on a linux OS
Okay. You're using Ubuntu Feisty (7.04), yes?
I'm afraid I don't run that, so I may not be able to help you
I don't know what the printer configuration tool for xfce is, unfortunately
Two links that should help you
... damn. One of the pages has been removed
Look at thatr link - it should be everything you need. It certainly claims to be :-)
Thanks alot, ccooke. This definitely helps
